anime.desc: A modern action adventure road story where a 17-year-old girl named Suzume helps a mysterious young man close doors from the outer side that are releasing disasters all over in Japan.
anime.name: Suzume No Tojimari

anime.desc: For the first time ever, Uta - the most beloved singer in the world - will reveal herself to the world at a live concert. The voice that the whole world has been waiting for is about to resound.
anime.name: One Piece Film Red

anime.desc: A high-school boy who has run away to Tokyo befriends a girl who appears to be able to manipulate the weather.
anime.name: Tenki no ko

anime.desc: Two strangers find themselves linked in a bizarre way. When a connection forms, will distance be the only thing to keep them apart?
anime.name: Kimi no Na wa

anime.desc: Determined to be like the volleyball championship's star player nicknamed "the small giant", Shoyo joins his school's volleyball club.
anime.name: Haikyuu!!

anime.desc: A 15-year-old boy and 27-year-old woman find an unlikely friendship one rainy day in the Shinjuku Gyoen National Garden.
anime.name: Koto no ha no niwa
